sqlMap.statement: SELECT DISTINCT ALL_STT.OWNER ,ALL_STT.TABLE_NAME FROM ALL_TAB_STATISTICS ALL_STT WHERE ALL_STT.OWNER = #schema# AND ALL_STT.STALE_STATS = 'YES' ORDER BY ALL_STT.OWNER ,ALL_STT.TABLE_NAME

SELECT SUC.STAT_UPD_TBL_NM FROM STAT_UPD_CONFIG SUC WHERE SUC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SUC.EZCANCELFLAG = 0
AND SUC.UPD_DTM_FLG = 'Y'
AND SUC.UPD_NGTLY_FLG = 'Y'
ORDER BY SUC.STAT_UPD_TBL_NM
